effects.display_string: (2) Set: Arcane Blast and Arcane Barrage damage increased by 6%.
(4) Set: Damage dealt by Arcane Orb and Arcane Missiles increased by 10%.

Set: When you hit a Jackpot!, you also gain Aether Attunement at 100% effectiveness.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Deal yourself in, granting you 7,635 to 9,331 Mastery for 15 sec and stacking the deck. Stacking the deck increases the minimum Mastery on future hands by 283 until you leave combat, up to 3 times. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to Hype you up, granting 363 Haste up to 5 times. Upon reaching maximum Hype, amp it up by 100% for 15 sec before starting again.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Antumbra, Shadow of the Cosmos

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
